Name: ALTF4
About the game: ALTF4? The Way You Play Games Is Simple!!Become a somewhat clumsy Knight and overcome Trap!!But the way to get there won't be simple.Will you be able to overcome the various traps and irritating terrains in your way? Test your reflexes! There is no SAVE in this game!! It's full of exciting background music and annoying traps! Don't you feel like you can play better next time every time your character dies? The various traps will keep driving you to death! Imagine how good it will feel to overcome those traps and finally clear the game! Once you get your first clear, why don't you aim for clearing the game at one go?
Meta Title: ALTF4: Nov 12, 2021, PUMPKIM and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on ALTF4? Check out the release date (Nov 12, 2021), developer insights from PUMPKIM, and a complete game summary.
